sense.def:
A cult
je verska skupina s posebnimi obredi, ki časti določeno osebo.

seg.quote: The ‘Moonies’ cult gained adherents at an alarming rate.

sense.def:
Kadar neka oseba, stvar ali dejavnost postane
a cult
, postane zelo priljubljena ali modna.

seg.quote: The Beatles became the heroes of a world-wide cult.
